name: Fantoccini
description:
The game contains flashes of light that can cause epileptic seizures.

This is a game about a secret tool that is held over people like you are puppets in the wrong hands.
You don't remember how you got here. You have to unravel the mystery of a mysterious place, but be careful, you are not alone!
The puppeteer has many puppets and do not think that you are his favorite ...




Gameplay.
You will have to explore the bunker, solve puzzles and try to get out of this scary place.

Game completion time is about an hour.
